alert.note: Alert for Carter; Custer; Fallon; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 8:40PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fallon, southeastern Custer, Carter and Powder River Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 837 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms and outflow winds along a line extending from near West Glendive to 17 miles northwest of Baker to 20 miles east of Broadus to 15 miles southwest of Biddle. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Weather station. This outflow as been producing reports of wind gusts 35 to 45 mph over the last hour. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baker, Broadus, Ekalaka, Ridgeway, Biddle, Alzada, Plevna, Ismay, Westmore, Boyes, Mill Iron, Sonnette, Medicine Rocks State Park, Capitol, Knowlton, Ollie, Moorhead, Willard, Olive and Webster. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Montana.
